plt.ioff()
import matplotlib
matplotlib.use('Agg')
fileName = 'Data/camea2018n000136.hdf'
fileName2 = 'Data/camea2018n000136.nxs'
file = DataFile(fileName)
try:
    file.plotA4(binning=20)
    assert False
except AttributeError:
    assert True
fig = file.plotA4(1)
fig2 = file.plotA4()
assertFile(fileName2)
file2 = DataFile(fileName2)
try:
    file2.plotA4(binning=20)
    assert False
except AttributeError:
    assert True
file2.plotA4(binning=1)
plt.close('all')
